Footer.newsletterText: Get the latest news from Spradling: new products, technology, events, trends... Let us inspire you.

HomePage.title: Spradling
HomePage.description: Spradling is a global leader in coated textile solutions, providing high-performance products for a wide range of industries.
HomePage.keywords: Spradling, coated textile solutions, high-performance products, industries

ExpertiseSection.title: Our expertise
ExpertiseSection.description: At Spradling, we have over 500 products designed specifically to meet the needs of each segment for a variety of applications.
ExpertiseSection.transportationDescription: Upholstery and flooring for transportation. Approved for original equipment.
ExpertiseSection.contractDescription: Inspiring hospitals, restaurants, offices, and public spaces with our upholstery and flooring.
ExpertiseSection.marineDescription: Trend-driven, unique and durable marine fabrics designed for harsh conditions.
ExpertiseSection.protectionDescription: Protective fabrics for the automotive industry. Approved for original equipment.
ExpertiseSection.apparelDescription: Protective fabrics for the automotive industry. Approved for original equipment.

collections.featuredCollectionsDescription: Explore the full collections or request samples.

Newsletter.title: Get the latest news from Spradling
Newsletter.description: Stay inspired by new products, technology, events, and trends from Proquinal and Spradling.

PasswordRecovery.title: Request password reset
PasswordRecovery.description: Enter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
PasswordRecovery.checkEmailDescription: Please check the email address {email} for instructions to reset your password. If you do not receive the email within 15 minutes please contact us.

PasswordReset.title: Set a new password
PasswordReset.error: Token expired or invalid, please try again

ProductDetail.warning: Displayed colors are for reference only and may vary depending on screen settings. Request material samples before ordering for an accurate color selection.

Specifications.productTerms: Our products, when tested with suitable component materials, may comply with California Technical Bulletin 133 and Boston Fire Code (test BFD IX-1). Certain clothing and accessory dyes (such as those used on denim jeans) may migrate to lighter colors. This phenomenon is increased by humidity and temperature and is irreversible. Spradling Group Inc. will not assume responsibility for dye transfer caused by external contaminants.

Signup.step1Desc: Design inspiration awaits! Sign up to order samples and review your order history.
Signup.mustContainPassword: It must contain at least 8 characters, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and at least one symbol.
Signup.lengthPassword: The password must be at least 8 characters.
Signup.uppercaseValidate: Must contain at least one capital letter.
Signup.lowerValidate: Must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Signup.numberValidate: Must contain at least one number.
Signup.symbolValidate: Must contain at least one symbol.

Sustainability.title: Our perspective on sustainability
Sustainability.description: We define sustainability as a long-term vision: economic success in harmony with social and environmental well-being, ensuring our enduring business and a protected environment.
Sustainability.descriptionCommitment: Get to know our Sustainability Report. Take a look and deep dive into our sustainability journey.
Sustainability.embracingTitle: Embracing the UN's 2030 agenda for sustainable development
Sustainability.embracingDesc: Our commitment to sustainability, aligned with the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), focuses on eleven key areas – eight directly linked and three indirectly contributing to their achievement.

Certifications.title: Certifications of excellence
Certifications.description: Showcasing our commitment to quality. Learn about our product certifications, processes, and industry standards.
Certifications.moreInfo: Need more information about our certifications?

EnvironmetalImpact.title: New standards of environmental awareness
EnvironmetalImpact.reducingImpact: Our goal isn't just durability, it's about reducing the impact and increasing our role in creating a more sustainable future.
EnvironmetalImpact.description: EcoSense®: Our green philosophy, driven by a commitment to minimize our ecological footprint.

PurposefulProcess.title: Purposeful process
PurposefulProcess.description: From advanced energy-efficient processes to wastewater treatment, sustainability is reflected in every aspect of our operations.

Commitment.title: Our commitment
Commitment.description: From advanced energy-efficient processes to wastewater treatment, our commitment to sustainability is reflected in every aspect of our operations.

Testimonial.title: Fabrics that change lives
Testimonial.description: Since 1980 (Colombia) and 2023 (Costa Rica), our Housing Plan has helped Spradling® Group employees achieve homeownership. After five years of excellent service and meeting other requirements, employees can apply for funds to repay debt, repair, or expand their homes.

Engaged.title: Be part of our world-class talent!
Engaged.description: Join our team and shape the future of design and innovation.

ContactSales.title: Meet our commercial team
ContactSales.description: Contact us for personalized support and expert advice.

sliderHome.title: Contract
sliderHome.description: Beyond performance, our coated fabrics and flooring elevate interior & exterior spaces, with colors and textures to suit any vision or demanding environment.

sliderHome.title: Marine
sliderHome.description: We manufacture high-quality technical upholstery fabrics that protect and enhance the style of commercial and luxury boats.

sliderHome.title: Transportation
sliderHome.description: For decades, our coated fabrics and flooring solutions have been part of vehicles, buses, trucks, trains, airplanes, motorcycle and more, meeting OEM standards.

Brands.title: Brands
Brands.description: Learn everything about our technology portfolio

permablok3-2.title: Permablok®
permablok3-2.subtitle: The sun’s rays have finally been tamed
permablok3-2.textSubtitle: At Spradling, we have developed an innovative technology to ensure even more comfortable surfaces. A highly advanced reflective protection, designed to reduce the amount of radiant energy or heat absorbed by surfaces, thereby improving the thermal sensation of upholstery during hot sunny days.
permablok3-2.howItWorksDesc: Permacool technology reduces the temperature of upholstery, by anywhere up to 26°F, when compared to regular vinyl-coated fabrics. Results were obtained by measurements carried out in accordance with ASTM D 4803-10**.

Services.downloadLibraryDesc: If you need an specific pattern, feel free to contact us!

Lamination.title: Lamination
Lamination.description: We manufacture standard and customized flame laminated products, combining state-of-the-art technology with the highest quality.
Lamination.description2: Spradling Resources offers versatile flame lamination solutions for vinyl, textiles, and plastics, from standard to customized. Our ISO 9001-2015 certified processes and advanced technology ensure quality, compliance (including Docket 90), and the ability to meet any specification.
Lamination.howIsMadeDesc: We use a controlled flame to briefly melt the surface of a foam material, which creates a thin layer of adhesive that is pressed against a material, such as fabric or vinyl. The heat and pressure create a seal.

WeAreSpradling.bannerTitle: Coated textile solutions for the long run
WeAreSpradling.bannerDesc: Built to withstand the test of time. Explore our full range of coated textile solutions in our catalog.
WeAreSpradling.bannerTitle2: Silvertex just got even more colorful
WeAreSpradling.bannerDesc2: Our most versatile pattern now comes in 20 bold new shades, expanding your creative possibilities like never before.
WeAreSpradling.whatWeAre: What we are, believe and do
WeAreSpradling.whatWeAreDesc: We combine local vision with a global spirit, working every day to inspire all over the world. We create designs that awaken emotions, highlight spaces and stand the test of time. We are passionate about making what was impossible yesterday a reality today.
WeAreSpradling.card1: We believe in the power of inspiration.
WeAreSpradling.card6: Versatility that inspires a world of applications.
WeAreSpradling.card8: Awareness that inspires a sustainable spirit.
WeAreSpradling.card9: People who inspire what we do every day.
WeAreSpradling.inspiredEmployeesDesc: A team of over 1,800 people who work every day with the desire to inspire the world, with the commitment of caring for the environment and communities we’re a part of.
WeAreSpradling.makeHistoryDesc: We are the first global leader in coated textile solutions, providing high-performance products for a wide range of industries.
WeAreSpradling.leading: Leading our daily actions with principles
WeAreSpradling.leadingDesc: Leading our daily actions with principles
WeAreSpradling.antiCorruptionPolicy: Download our Anti-Corruption and Anti-Bribery Policy

SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary1: Proquinal® was born in Colombia. The plant and its offices were built in the city of Bogotá.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary11: We expanded the plant in Costa Rica, increasing our production capacity.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary12: We have consolidated our position in the market, proving that we are experts in what we do, and our 60 years confirm this.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2: The President of Colombia presents us with the Silver Medal of the Exporter.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary3: We consolidated the commercial alliance with Spradling International Inc., as the exclusive representative in the United States, and with All Cargo Intermodal Forwarding Inc. - ACIF -, as a logistics operator in Miami, United States.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary4: We consolidated the commercial alliance with Spradling International GmbH, as the exclusive representative in Germany.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary5: The commercial alliance with Euro Spradling was consolidated, as the exclusive representative in Spain.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary6: The plant was inaugurated with a construction area of ​​15,000 m2, on a plot of 68,000 m2.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary7: The commercial alliance with CTP Textiles was consolidated, as the exclusive representative in the United Kingdom.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary8: Spradling International, acquired the marine division of the North American company G&T, and thus Spradling International Marine (SIM) was born.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary9: Spradling México is born in México City.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineTitle8: We expand to the Marine sector
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2010_1: We received ISO 14001 certification for our Costa Rica facility, endorsing our environmental management system.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2014_2: We achieved this certification for responsible and effective management of net carbon emissions at our facility in Costa Rica.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2018_1: We received ISO 50001 certification for our facility in Costa Rica, endorsing our corporate energy management system.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2019_2: We certified our facility in Colombia as the first Carbon Neutral company in the sector in the country.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2020_1: We developed new 100% waterproof coated fabrics with permanent anti-fluid, which responded to the need of the health sector for the Covid-19 pandemic.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2020_2: We received ISO 14001 certification for our facility in Colombia, endorsing our environmental management system.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2021_1: Spradling® International Inc. acquires the US assets of CMI Enterprises, enabling the creation of Spradling® Resources.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2022_1: We made an investment of $30 million dollars for the technification and diversification of the production processes at the facility in Costa Rica. With this, a new calendering machine was acquired, positioning us as a benchmark for advanced and successful manufacturing.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2022_2: We received ISO 45001 certification for occupational health and safety management at our two production facilities in Colombia and Costa Rica. In addition, we received Indoor Air Quality and Greenguard Gold certifications for our products with low volatile organic compounds (VOC).
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2022_3: We acquired a new calender in Costa Rica, marking a milestone for the Group in production capacity and portfolio diversification with the development of films for medical device applications, technical tarps, and geomembranes.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2023_1: We developed the first sustainable products with bio-attributed components and 100% recycled yarn backing made from PET bottles. For the first time, we published an EPD for two of our products. In addition, we received ISO 50001 certification for our facility in Colombia, endorsing our corporate energy management system.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2024_1: We celebrate 65 years of our facility in Colombia! In addition, we celebrate 20 years of the Costa Rican facility and the Spradling® Europe operation.
SpradlingTimeline.timelineSummary2024_2: We received the EcoVadis medal for the first time in recognition of our sustainability initiatives of both of our facilities.
SpradlingTimeline.title: We make history

WhyChooseSpradling.title: Why choose Spradling
WhyChooseSpradling.whyChooseUsDesc: We are committed to providing products that meet the market’s technical needs, making spaces more attractive with top quality, so they stand the test of time. Design, our technology and the textiles we develop for our coatings are what set us apart and make us industry leaders.
WhyChooseSpradling.cardDesignDesc: We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation.
WhyChooseSpradling.cardMaterialDesc: We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation.
WhyChooseSpradling.designPerspectiveDesc: We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation.
WhyChooseSpradling.hasNoLimitsDesc: At Spradling we are always in the search to go beyond the limits. Design is a priority for us; that is why we do everything to be at the forefront and achieve surprise with our products anywhere in the world.
WhyChooseSpradling.crossBordersDesc: We have a global design team that works on every detail to ensure a wide variety of engravings, prints and range of colors according to the latest trends in world design. Our team has an important knowledge of the markets in which we are present, they are always in a constant search for new ways based on the present, the future of fashion and interior design.
WhyChooseSpradling.sourcesOfInpirationDesc: The macro trends are our sources of inspiration, confirming their acceptance and use in the different segments and markets. Our designs have no limits; We propose varied designs that can be geometric, animal, mineral, technological, floral, ethnic, among others.
WhyChooseSpradling.coatedFabricsDesc: We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation. We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation.
WhyChooseSpradling.waterproofDesc: Waterproof, so they can be used in interior and exterior applications.
WhyChooseSpradling.easyToCleanDesc: They maintain their original appearance even after years of use, since they can be easily cleaned with soap and water.
WhyChooseSpradling.durabilityDesc: They have a great durability since they are fabrics resistant to wear, tear and other types of damage.
WhyChooseSpradling.stainResisistanceDesc: They offer greater protection against stains, confer antibacterial protection and greater resistance to the accumulation of mold and spores.
WhyChooseSpradling.competitivePriceDesc: They are the most profitable option for manufacturers who want to market a high-quality product at a competitive price.
WhyChooseSpradling.highestQualityDesc: They offer lasting value to customers or end users: an attractive product, of high quality and at an excellent price.
WhyChooseSpradling.innovativeLooksDesc: They have enough versatility to simulate the appearance of the skin or fabrics or allow to create a completely new and innovative look.
WhyChooseSpradling.flameRetardancyDesc: They have flame retardant properties that guarantee safety and compliance with the technical specifications that industries request from manufacturers.
WhyChooseSpradling.ecoFriendlyDesc: They are a material that respects the environment for its energy efficiency and resources, recyclability, sustainability and durability.
WhyChooseSpradling.moreInfo: Do you need more information about our certifications?
WhyChooseSpradling.aroundTheWorldDesc: We are located in some of the main cities of the world, with the purpose of reaching our customers no matter where they are.

OurProductionUnits.inspirationDesc: We have been producing coated fabrics for over 60 years. Our products are the best in the market, and we have a long history of innovation.
OurProductionUnits.colombiaPlantDesc: Since 1959, we have been an engine of economic and social development in Colombia. With more than 900 professionals, in a Great Place to Work certified space, we create coated fabrics and coated floors that reflect our unwavering commitment to building and strengthening the country, prioritizing sustainable excellence and an inspiring work environment for all. In 23,200 m² we produce +18.6 million meters of coated fabrics produced annually.
OurProductionUnits.costaRicaPlantSubtitle: 20 years of sustainable leadership in the region
OurProductionUnits.costaRicaPlantDesc: Innovation and sustainability converge in a space of more than 30,000 m² certified as a Great Place to Work. With two decades of experience, we are home to the most modern and organized coated fabric manufacturing plant on the continent, where a passion for quality translates into products of unsurpassed excellence. Our operation not only seeks the satisfaction of our customers but is also committed to the well-being of the planet.
OurProductionUnits.purposeTitle: Our plants are driven by a higher purpose
OurProductionUnits.purposeDesc: We work every day motivated by a commitment to the future, to have a positive impact on the environment and to improve the lives of the people and communities around us.
OurProductionUnits.wasteOptimizationDesc: We transform more than 3 tons of organic waste from the canteen into compost for use in the plant's gardens and reforestation areas.
OurProductionUnits.energyEfficiencyDesc: We have more than 600 solar panels, with certifications such as ISO 14001 and ISO 50001 that support our daily commitment to reduce our environmental impact.
OurProductionUnits.waterCareDesc: We have a treatment system to ensure the quality of our wastewater and comply with legal standards. In addition, we reuse treated water to irrigate our green areas, and we have a rainwater harvesting system with a capacity of 22m³.
OurProductionUnits.carbonEmissionDesc: We calculate our carbon footprint to understand our direct greenhouse gas emissions and offset them by purchasing bonds and participating in forest conservation projects to mitigate climate change.
OurProductionUnits.newCalender: New calender, more power to create
OurProductionUnits.newCalenderDesc: We’ve added a next-generation calender, one of a kind in Latin America, that delivers exceptional precision, efficiency, and versatility. This advanced technology allows us to produce specialized films for medical devices, technical tarps, and large-format geomembranes, meeting the highest standards in the market.
OurProductionUnits.cediDesc: At the Distribution Center we use German technology with an automated transport system. An innovative bridge connected to an automated guided vehicle allows us to move finished products autonomously. This pioneering approach in the region facilitates an efficient connection between the distribution center and the production area.
OurProductionUnits.certificationsOfExcellenceDesc: At the Distribution Center we use German technology with an automated transport system. An innovative bridge connected to an automated guided vehicle allows us to move finished products autonomously. This pioneering approach in the region facilitates an efficient connection between the distribution center and the production area.
